PropertyList.title: P-38L Lightning
PropertyList.line: Set the Magneto On Both(depress "}" key, thrice )
Flaps 15 degrees, ( key "] " twice ) release the parking break, push the throttle
If you need , you may use the takeoff boost, which is activated to 0.99 or 1 (throttle values are from 0 to 1)
Radiators doors are automatically opened when the P-38L is on the ground
After take off, you may close it ("$" key)
During landing they will open automatically again
after takeoff the engine mixture value must be 0.69
